column4: I'm trying to set up a Remote Desktop conenction between my Ubuntu PC and a Tablet PC running a stripped Windows version, the RD screen on Windows has a field named 'Domain' that I am unsure on what to fill with. I've tried IP address of the Ubuntu PC, router, +port number, 'local' 'localhost' etc...
can't install any software on this tablet pc, the default apps will have to do..
you could try WORKGROUP, and MSHOME
